tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted Dr Srinivas 4 years back for my kid constipation issue. We are happy about the treatment. Before I consult him We consulted several doctors but no good news. 
We consulted him again recently  after 4 years for my kid IBS issues. We consulted many pediatrics and might have visited more than 30 times , even gastro specialist. No one could identify it a IBS.  The treatment is good. The issue is reduced by about 75 %.  Hopefully We would find complete solution soon.  Good doctor. Listen to patient case history.  Spend enough time with patient to diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** he treats patients like no other doctor does he understand the value of patients which is important. My son who had liver isssues since birth every doctors from my hometown had given up but Srinivas sir handled this case with ease he gave us lots of confidence and asked us not to panic .. he took care of every aspect and solved the issue ** ** **** *** when I told him that he is the best he never took credit . Whenever I have issues I consult him via telemedicine

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is absolutely god for me, because he is didn't just treat my child,he saved my child from wrong treatment .He is a great doctor and also a great human being.God bless him.
IMPRESSED BY THE WAY THE CHILD WAS TREATED BY THE DOCTOR. A MUST VISIT FOR CHILD CARE TO DR. SRINIVAS. KANCHI KAMAKOTI IS ONE OF THE BEST IN CHILD CARE. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK. GOD BLESS.
Dr. Srinivas B, What a Pleasure to meet you ! Such a friendly demeanor to my child who appreciated you all the way back home ! Glad to have visited and consulted you.
** ******** ** **** ** ********* *** treating he is very friendly and has more patience to answer all our doubts .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my kid there....i was so sensitive and she had allergy problems.....he gave me the confidence and to fight against it.....i personally have several gastro issues and i consulted him....also am doing good now.....he is not a doc but a good magician with positivity loaded......he is friendly and down to the earth person.....

He literally saved my child, my son had bile acid synthesis deficiency & all the doctors gave up on him suggesting to wait for the inevitable liver failure which will result in transplant. Dr. Srinivas diagnosed his problem accurately along with the perfect cure from his condition which was just a tablet, ** ** ********* ************** experienced & one of the few doctors who actually practices medicine as a service. The best. Would strongly recommend. We went from transplant to a tablet.

He was very present , with wat I was saying he was listening patiently and was very friendly 
Will definitely go again in the future if and wen necessary

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor patiently listend to all my issues and gave proper solution . Very friendly doctor, I do recommend.
